RssItem.Description: A tranquil heart gives life to the flesh, but envy makes the bones rot.
RssItem.Title: Proverbs 14:30

RssItem.Description: Trust in the LORD forever, for the LORD GOD is an everlasting rock.
RssItem.Title: Isaiah 26:4

RssItem.Description: Blessed is the man who remains steadfast under trial, for when he has stood the test he will receive the crown of life, which God has promised to those who love him.
RssItem.Title: James 1:12

RssItem.Description: The LORD is far from the wicked, but he hears the prayer of the righteous.
RssItem.Title: Proverbs 15:29

RssItem.Description: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans for welfare and not for evil, to give you a future and a hope.
RssItem.Title: Jeremiah 29:11

RssItem.Description: Oh, taste and see that the LORD is good! Blessed is the man who takes refuge in him!
RssItem.Title: Psalm 34:8
